title: Facebook : monthly brand profile follower growth 2017
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Growth rate in each Month on the y axis.
The Growth rate is appeared to be the highest at Month Sep '17 and lowest at Month Nov '17.
The highest Month Sep '17 has 3.18 more Growth rate than the lowest Month Nov '17.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Growth rate for 5 number of Months.
Month Sep '17 has the highest Growth rate and Nov '17 has the lowest Growth rate.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Growth rate in each Month on the y axis.
The Growth rate is appeared to be the highest at Month Sep '17 and lowest at Month Nov '17.
The highest Month Sep '17 has 3.18 more Growth rate than the lowest Month Nov '17.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Growth rate in the y axis.
The maximum Growth rate 3.28 is found at Month Sep '17 and the minimum is found at Nov '17 where Month is 0.1.
The minimum Month Nov '17 has got 32.8 times less Growth rate than the maximum Month Sep '17.
The Month Sep '17 has the highest Growth rate, followed by Aug '17, and Dec '17. Down to the Month Nov '17 which is the lowest.
Overall Growth rate has grew over the Months.
Similar Growth rate is found in Month Nov '17, and Oct '17.
The Month Sep '17 tends to be 3.34 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 4.91.
